biotools.summary: Deep Brain Stimulation Simulator (DBSim) is a free COMSOL Multiphysics-based stand-alone program developed by the Neuroengineering group for performing patient-specific FEM simulations of DBS based on the data generated by ELMA.

bioschemas.name: DBSim
bioschemas.summary: Deep Brain Stimulation Simulator (DBSim) is a free COMSOL Multiphysics-based stand-alone program developed by the Neuroengineering group for performing patient-specific FEM simulations of DBS based on the data generated by ELMA.
